trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_SEQ_00<tab>Does Stigma-4 dream of electric Miw Miisv? These are the questions you ask of your imagination.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to the nurturing nanny.

TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> at the Elysian playgrounds.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the nurturing nanny.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> at the Elysian playgrounds.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the nurturing nanny.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at the Elysian playgrounds.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the nurturing nanny.)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>

TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_STIGMA4_000_000<tab>Correspondence from Ea received. In adherence to updated nurturing protocols, acquisition and delivery of materials deemed “comfy” by organic life-forms has been requested.

TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_STIGMA4_000_001<tab>Analyzing available resources... <meep> Viable material identified. Projections indicate 99.9842% compatibility with the tender epidermis of infantile Miw Miisv.

TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_STIGMA4_000_002<tab>Imparting mission objectives: obtain appropriate amounts of clay from the recreational areas in Elysion and deliver it to the abode of the Ea, where a nanny awaits.

TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_STIGMA4_000_003<tab>Imparting mission objectives: obtain appropriate quantities of softwood from the recreational areas in Elysion and deliver it to the abode of the Ea, where a nanny awaits.

TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_STIGMA4_000_004<tab>Imparting mission objectives: obtain coral from the recreational areas in Elysion and deliver it to the abode of the Ea, where a nanny awaits. A share of proceeds from the sale of gold salmon roe will be donated to further Miw Miisv nourishment.
TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_EA04627_000_010<tab>You must be the fleshy one I ordered. Did you come complete with useful pieces?

TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_EA04627_000_011<tab>Yes, yes...precisely what I had in mind! The corporeal frames of our children are ever so delicate, so I thought soft and natural environs might better attend to their physical needs.

TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_EA04627_000_012<tab>I would have gathered the required materials myself, but lacking a body makes such labor quite impossible. Providing for progeny by the sweat of one's brow... Such is a life we can but barely remember. Anyway, I hope you will lend us your brow again sometime.
TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_STIGMA4_000_020<tab>Return of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> confirmed. Requesting additional information.
TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_STIGMA4_000_021<tab>Verbal analysis complete. Satisfied nanny confirmed. Mission success.

TEXT_BANOMI121_04627_STIGMA4_000_022<tab>The true nature of the Miw Miisv continues to elude comprehensive analysis. Satisfactory periods of stasis unattainable. Diverting Last Dregs resources to data acquisition protocols... Recommending <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> strengthen <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> own data acquisition protocols, regardless of relative insignificance.
